title: HELP
body: One day i logged in and i saw that i had like 15000 IP, and i didnt knew how those IP were in my account. Later i saw that Lux, Akali and Darius weren't unlocked. I think sb got into my account and sold them. Today i discovered this refund system and i wanted to refund Nidalee cause i dont want her. I went to the refund page and it says that i have wasted all my 3 refunds on Darius Lux and Akali (it wasnt me). How can i undo this ? Can i get my 3 tokens back ?

replies.body:
Eek, that doesn't sound like a good way to being the new year. :(

If you submit a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), you can get in touch with one of our recovery specialists who can take a look at see what we can do.

Let me know if you have any questions.
